TutorialsÂ¶

Here we layout some useful basic usage guides for the user. We start with an introduction to the PCEBuilder and the PCEReg classes, which are the building blocks of tesuract. They construct the multi-variate polynomial object and fit the coefficients using existing regression algorithms in scikit-learn.

  • Introduction to polynomial regression
    • Setup the problem
    • Fit a polynomial
    • Feature importance
    • Prediction
      • Scale error
    • Different fit algorithms
  • Some other usage cases
    • Defining custom coefficient array
    • Custom multiindex array
    • Custom multiindex and coefficient array
    • Using normalized Legendre basis
